projects.description: A program that displays a randomally selected qoute and background color after a set amount of time or when the user clicks a button.
A program that creates a page for a long list of students by dividing them into blocks of 10.
An interactive form that a user can fill out. Any incorrect or incomplete information will result in an error message for the missing fields upon pressing the submit button.

An interactive game that selects a random phrase. The player guesses the hidden letters by selecting each letter from the on-screen keyboard. Incorrect guesses deplete your 'lives' and correct guesses reveal the letter(s).

Is a program that displays an employee directory that obtains the data of each one from the third-party API(Application Programming Interface) "The Random User Generator". It also includes a search function and a function to see more information about users and move between them if you click on them.
